Getting setup

  1. Download SublimeText.
  2. Download today's project template from the github page.
  3. Install Chrome if you don't have it already
  4. Launch your Terminal app from Applications > Utilities > Terminal
  5. Install Package Control for SublimeText * We'll walk through this together.
  6. Inside SublimeText go to Sublime Text > Preferences > Package Control > Package Control : Install Package and install the Front End Snippets Package. * We'll walk through this together.

Using the Front End Snippets package

You've just installed a library of snippets (aka: macros, shortcuts etc.) into Sublime Text. The snippet library contains code examples for common html, css and javascript tasks. Snippets can be used by typing a keyword and hitting the tab key. For example typing _tag and hitting Tab will print out a generic html tag example.

Snippets you can use in this lecture are highlighted with the following convention:
_html

Read the Docs
